name: Chromofusion
description:
Combine a variety of colorful cubes to jump on, open doors, and activate elevators. Complete over 15 puzzling rooms and reach the end!  There might even be a secret there waiting for you ;)

The fewer cubes you have the larger they get. 

Good luck!

Coding, Game Design, Visuals by Arda Gürcan

Music by Can Kadıoğlu
